metadata.titleEn: WATER: Dataset of airborne WiDAS mission in the Linze station-Linze grassland flight zone on Jul. 11, 2008
metadata.titleCn: 黑河综合遥感联合试验：临泽站-临泽草地站飞行区机载WiDAS数据集（2008年7月11日）
metadata.description:
The dataset of airborne WiDAS mission was obtained in the Linze station-Linze grassland flight zone on Jul. 11, 2008.
     Intra-band data available for general users include Level-2C data (after geometric, radiometric and atmospheric corrections), Level-1B browse image (after intra-band matching) and Level-2B browse image (after registration). The raw data, Level-1A, and data processing parameters were filed; applications would be evaluated prior to access. Data processing started in Aug. 2008 and ended in Apr. 2009, and in Nov. 2009, CCD data were reprocessed to adjust radiometric calibration. 
     The flying time of each route was as follows:

{|
! id
! flight
! relative height
! starttime
! endtime
! data size
! data state
! data quality
! ground targets 
|-
| 1 || 1#13 || 1500m || 1:52:06 || 11:58:02 || 90 || processed; compelete || good || Pingchuan reservoir
|-
| 2 || 1#11 || 1500m || 12:11:38 || 12:09:54 || 95 || processed; compelete || good || Linze grassland station
|-
| 3 || 1#9 || 1500m || 12:14:58 || 12:20:42 || 87 || processed; compelete || good || Pingchuan reservoir
|-
| 4 || 1#7 || 1500m || 12:27:14 || 12:33:18 || 92 || processed; compelete || good || desert transit zone
|-
| 5 || 1#5 || 1500m || 12:38:22 || 12:44:14 || 89 || processed; compelete || good || north-south desert plot
|- 
| 6 || 1#3 || 1500m || 12:50:30 || 12:56:26 || 90 || processed; compelete || good || Pingchuan reservoir
|-                      
| 7 || 1#1 || 1500m || 13:01:46 || 13:07:46 || 91 || processed; compelete || good || Linze station
|}
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集为机载WiDAS传感器于2008年07月11日获取，地点在临泽站-临泽草地站飞行区。
原始数据经过几何校正、辐射定标和大气校正后发布，面向普通用户的数据产品为Level-2C产品（经过几何校正、辐射定标和大气校正），以及Level-1B（波段间配准）快视图和Level-2B（波段间配准）快视图。原始数据（Level-1A数据）和数据处理参数存档，需提交申请并通过审批后才能获得。数据处理时间为2008年8月-2009年4月，完成时间为2009年4月，2009年11月做了一次CCD相机辐射定标的订正。    
本数据集的原始数据包括7条航线。各航线的飞行时间如下表：
{|
! 序号
! 航线名称
! 相对航高
! 开始时间
! 结束时间
! 数据量（景）
! 数据状态
! 数据质量
! 主要地面目标 
|-
| 1 || 1#13 || 约1500米 || 1:52:06 || 11:58:02 || 90 || 完整，已处理 || 好 || 平川水库
|-
| 2 || 1#11 || 约1500米 || 12:11:38 || 12:09:54 || 95 || 完整，已处理 || 好 || 临泽草地站
|-
| 3 || 1#9 || 约1500米 || 12:14:58 || 12:20:42 || 87 || 完整，已处理 || 好 || 平川水库
|-
| 4 || 1#7 || 约1500米 || 12:27:14 || 12:33:18 || 92 || 完整，已处理 || 好 || 荒漠过渡带样方
|-
| 5 || 1#5 || 约1500米 || 12:38:22 || 12:44:14 || 89 || 完整，已处理 || 好 || 荒漠南北样带
|- 
| 6 || 1#3 || 约1500米 || 12:50:30 || 12:56:26 || 90 || 完整，已处理 || 好 || 平川水库
|-                      
| 7 || 1#1 || 约1500米 || 13:01:46 || 13:07:46 || 91 || 完整，已处理 || 好 || 临泽站
|}

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of the data processing techniques used to transform raw remote sensing data into user-accessible products?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 将原始遥感数据转化为用户可访问产品的数据处理技术的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: geometric correction, radiometric calibration, atmospheric correction, Level-2C products, Level-1B quick views, Level-2B quick views, Level-1A raw data, processing parameters archived
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 几何校正，辐射定标，大气校正，Level-2C 产品，Level-1B 快视图，Level-2B 快视图，Level-1A 原始数据，处理参数存档

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many flight lines were used in the data collection for the airborne WiDAS dataset acquired on July 11, 2008?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 2008年7月11日获取的空气WiDAS数据集在数据收集过程中使用了多少条飞行线？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'geometric correction' mean in the context of data processing for airborne sensor datasets?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在航空传感器数据集的数据处理上下文中，“几何校正”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: Geometric correction refers to the process applied to the original data collected by an airborne sensor to correct spatial distortions caused by the sensor’s perspective and motion during data acquisition. This ensures that the data accurately represents the true positions of features on the Earth's surface.
Definition.AnswerCn: 几何校正是指对由空中传感器收集的原始数据进行的处理，以纠正由于传感器的视角和在数据采集过程中的运动而导致的空间畸变。这确保了数据准确地表示地球表面特征的真实位置。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the factors that necessitate geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction in airborne sensor data collection methods?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在航空传感器数据采集方法中， necessitate 几何校正、辐射校准和大气校正的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The necessity for geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction in airborne sensor data collection methods arises from the need to ensure accuracy and reliability of the data. Geometric correction is required to rectify distortions due to the sensor's movement and varying altitude. Radiometric calibration is necessary to translate raw sensor data into meaningful physical quantities by accounting for sensor-specific characteristics and environmental conditions. Atmospheric correction is crucial to remove the influence of atmospheric conditions on the recorded data, ensuring that the data reflect the true surface characteristics. These processes contribute to producing reliable Level-2C products, which are essential for accurate analysis and application.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在航空传感器数据采集方法中，几何校正、辐射校准和大气校正的必要性源于确保数据的准确性和可靠性。几何校正是为了纠正由于传感器运动和高度变化引起的失真。辐射校准是必要的，以将原始传感器数据转换为有意义的物理量，考虑到传感器特定特性和环境条件。大气校正对于去除大气条件对记录数据的影响至关重要，确保数据反映真实的地表特征。这些过程有助于生成可靠的Level-2C产品，这对于准确分析和应用至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the use of airborne WiDAS sensors affect the quality and completeness of data collected for geographical features such as reservoirs and transition zones in remote sensing experiments?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用空中WiDAS传感器如何影响遥感实验中收集的地理特征（如水库和过渡区）数据的质量和完整性？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of airborne WiDAS sensors, after undergoing geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction, results in high-quality and complete data for geographical features. The dataset includes imagery from multiple flight lines over areas like Pingchuan Reservoir and desert transition zones, ensuring comprehensive coverage and good data quality.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 经过几何校正、辐射校准和大气校正后，使用空中WiDAS传感器可以获得高质量和完整的地理特征数据。该数据集包括来自多个航线的影像，覆盖了如平川水库和沙漠过渡区等区域，确保了全面的覆盖和良好的数据质量。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the goals of collecting airborne WiDAS sensor data over the Linze station and Linze grassland station flight area, and how does this contribute to the understanding of land surface characteristics?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集Linze站和Linze草地站飞行区域的空气WiDAS传感器数据的目标是什么，这如何有助于理解地表特征？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal of collecting airborne WiDAS sensor data over the Linze station and Linze grassland station flight area is to provide comprehensive remote sensing datasets that have undergone geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction. These datasets aim to enhance the understanding of land surface characteristics by offering high-quality Level-2C products suitable for general users. The data collection supports the analysis of specific ground targets such as the Pingchuan Reservoir, Linze grassland station, and desert transition zones, thereby contributing to the study of environmental and ecological dynamics in these areas.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 收集Linze站和Linze草原站飞行区域的空气WiDAS传感器数据的目标是提供经过几何校正、辐射校准和大气校正的综合遥感数据集。这些数据集旨在通过提供高质量的Level-2C产品来增强对地表特征的理解，适合一般用户使用。数据收集支持对特定地面目标的分析，如平川水库、Linze草原站和沙漠过渡区，从而有助于研究这些地区的环境和生态动态。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What steps are involved in processing airborne WiDAS sensor data to achieve Level-2C products, including any corrections or calibrations applied?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 处理空气borne WiDAS传感器数据以实现Level-2C产品的步骤包括应用的任何校正或校准。
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The processing involves geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction. Original data undergoes these processes to be released as Level-2C products. Additionally, CCD camera radiometric calibration corrections were performed in November 2009.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 处理过程包括几何校正、辐射校正和大气校正。原始数据经过这些处理后发布为Level-2C产品。此外，CCD相机的辐射校正修正于2009年11月进行。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What data processing techniques enable the transformation of raw aerial sensor data into user-friendly Level-2C products suitable for research purposes?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些数据处理技术能够将原始航空传感器数据转化为适合研究用途的用户友好型二级C产品？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The transformation of raw aerial sensor data into user-friendly Level-2C products is enabled by geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 原始航空传感器数据转化为用户友好的二级C级产品是通过几何校正、辐射校正和大气校正实现的。
